actions.name: ActivateOrganizationsAccess
actions.description: Grants permission to activate trusted access between StackSets and Organizations. With trusted access between StackSets and Organizations activated, the management account has permissions to create and manage StackSets for your organization

actions.name: ActivateType
actions.description: Grants permission to activate a public third-party extension, making it available for use in stack templates

actions.name: BatchDescribeTypeConfigurations
actions.description: Grants permission to return configuration data for the specified CloudFormation extensions

actions.name: CancelUpdateStack
actions.description: Grants permission to cancel an update on the specified stack

actions.name: ContinueUpdateRollback
actions.description: Grants permission to continue rolling back a stack that is in the UPDATE_ROLLBACK_FAILED state to the UPDATE_ROLLBACK_COMPLETE state

actions.name: CreateChangeSet
actions.description: Grants permission to create a list of changes for a stack

actions.name: CreateGeneratedTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to create a template from existing resources that are not already managed with CloudFormation

actions.name: CreateStack
actions.description: Grants permission to create a stack as specified in the template

actions.name: CreateStackInstances
actions.description: Grants permission to create stack instances for the specified accounts, within the specified regions

actions.name: CreateStackRefactor
actions.description: Grants permission to create a stack refactor

actions.name: CreateStackSet
actions.description: Grants permission to create a stackset as specified in the template

actions.name: CreateUploadBucket
actions.description: Grants permission to upload templates to Amazon S3 buckets. Used only by the AWS CloudFormation console and is not documented in the API reference

actions.name: DeactivateOrganizationsAccess
actions.description: Grants permission to deactivate trusted access between StackSets and Organizations. If trusted access is deactivated, the management account does not have permissions to create and manage service-managed StackSets for your organization

actions.name: DeactivateType
actions.description: Grants permission to deactivate a public extension that was previously activated in this account and region

actions.name: DeleteChangeSet
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the specified change set. Deleting change sets ensures that no one executes the wrong change set

actions.name: DeleteGeneratedTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a generated template

actions.name: DeleteStack
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a specified stack

actions.name: DeleteStackInstances
actions.description: Grants permission to delete stack instances for the specified accounts, in the specified regions

actions.name: DeleteStackSet
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a specified stackset

actions.name: DeregisterType
actions.description: Grants permission to deregister an existing CloudFormation type or type version

actions.name: DescribeAccountLimits
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve your account's AWS CloudFormation limits

actions.name: DescribeChangeSet
actions.description: Grants permission to return the description for the specified change set

actions.name: DescribeChangeSetHooks
actions.description: Grants permission to return the Hook invocation information for the specified change set

actions.name: DescribeGeneratedTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to describe a generated template. The output includes details about the progress of the creation of a generated template

actions.name: DescribeOrganizationsAccess
actions.description: Grants permission to return information about the account's OrganizationAccess status

actions.name: DescribePublisher
actions.description: Grants permission to return information about a CloudFormation extension publisher

actions.name: DescribeResourceScan
actions.description: Grants permission to describe details of a resource scan

actions.name: DescribeStackDriftDetectionStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to return information about a stack drift detection operation

actions.name: DescribeStackEvents
actions.description: Grants permission to return all stack related events for a specified stack

actions.name: DescribeStackInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to return the stack instance that's associated with the specified stack set, AWS account, and region

actions.name: DescribeStackRefactor
actions.description: Grants permission to return the description for the specified stack refactor

actions.name: DescribeStackResource
actions.description: Grants permission to return a description of the specified resource in the specified stack

actions.name: DescribeStackResourceDrifts
actions.description: Grants permission to return drift information for the resources that have been checked for drift in the specified stack

actions.name: DescribeStackResources
actions.description: Grants permission to return AWS resource descriptions for running and deleted stacks

actions.name: DescribeStackSet
actions.description: Grants permission to return the description of the specified stack set

actions.name: DescribeStackSetOperation
actions.description: Grants permission to return the description of the specified stack set operation

actions.name: DescribeStacks
actions.description: Grants permission to return the description for the specified stack, and to all stacks when used in combination with the ListStacks action

actions.name: DescribeType
actions.description: Grants permission to return information about the CloudFormation type requested

actions.name: DescribeTypeRegistration
actions.description: Grants permission to return information about the registration process for a CloudFormation type

actions.name: DetectStackDrift
actions.description: Grants permission to detects whether a stack's actual configuration differs, or has drifted, from it's expected configuration, as defined in the stack template and any values specified as template parameters

actions.name: DetectStackResourceDrift
actions.description: Grants permission to return information about whether a resource's actual configuration differs, or has drifted, from it's expected configuration, as defined in the stack template and any values specified as template parameters

actions.name: DetectStackSetDrift
actions.description: Grants permission to enable users to detect drift on a stack set and the stack instances that belong to that stack set

actions.name: EstimateTemplateCost
actions.description: Grants permission to return the estimated monthly cost of a template

actions.name: ExecuteChangeSet
actions.description: Grants permission to update a stack using the input information that was provided when the specified change set was created

actions.name: ExecuteStackRefactor
actions.description: Grants permission to execute a stack refactor using the input information that was provided when the specified stack refactor was created

actions.name: GetGeneratedTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a generated template

actions.name: GetStackPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to return the stack policy for a specified stack

actions.name: GetTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to return the template body for a specified stack

actions.name: GetTemplateSummary
actions.description: Grants permission to return information about a new or existing template

actions.name: ImportStacksToStackSet
actions.description: Grants permission to enable users to import existing stacks to a new or existing stackset

actions.name: ListChangeSets
actions.description: Grants permission to return the ID and status of each active change set for a stack. For example, AWS CloudFormation lists change sets that are in the CREATE_IN_PROGRESS or CREATE_PENDING state

actions.name: ListExports
actions.description: Grants permission to list all exported output values in the account and region in which you call this action

actions.name: ListGeneratedTemplates
actions.description: Grants permission to list your generated templates in this Region

actions.name: ListHookResults
actions.description: Grants permission to return Hook invocations result information for the specified target

actions.name: ListImports
actions.description: Grants permission to list all stacks that are importing an exported output value

actions.name: ListResourceScanRelatedResources
actions.description: Grants permission to list the related resources for a list of resources from a resource scan. The response indicates whether each returned resource is already managed by CloudFormation

actions.name: ListResourceScanResources
actions.description: Grants permission to list the resources from a resource scan. The results can be filtered by resource identifier, resource type prefix, tag key, and tag value

actions.name: ListResourceScans
actions.description: Grants permission to list the resource scans from newest to oldest. By default it will return up to 10 resource scans

actions.name: ListStackInstanceResourceDrifts
actions.description: Grants permission to return drift information for the resources that have been checked for drift in the specified stack instance

actions.name: ListStackInstances
actions.description: Grants permission to return summary information about stack instances that are associated with the specified stack set

actions.name: ListStackRefactorActions
actions.description: Grants permission to return the list of actions of the specified stack refactor

actions.name: ListStackRefactors
actions.description: Grants permission to return the ID and status of each active stack refactor

actions.name: ListStackResources
actions.description: Grants permission to return descriptions of all resources of the specified stack

actions.name: ListStackSetAutoDeploymentTargets
actions.description: Grants permission to return summary information about StackSet Auto Deployment Targets

actions.name: ListStackSetOperationResults
actions.description: Grants permission to return summary information about the results of a stack set operation

actions.name: ListStackSetOperations
actions.description: Grants permission to return summary information about operations performed on a stack set

actions.name: ListStackSets
actions.description: Grants permission to return summary information about stack sets that are associated with the user

actions.name: ListStacks
actions.description: Grants permission to return the summary information for stacks whose status matches the specified StackStatusFilter. In combination with the DescribeStacks action, grants permission to list descriptions for stacks

actions.name: ListTypeRegistrations
actions.description: Grants permission to list CloudFormation type registration attempts

actions.name: ListTypeVersions
actions.description: Grants permission to list versions of a particular CloudFormation type

actions.name: ListTypes
actions.description: Grants permission to list available CloudFormation types

actions.name: PublishType
actions.description: Grants permission to publish the specified extension to the CloudFormation registry as a public extension in this region

actions.name: RecordHandlerProgress
actions.description: Grants permission to record the handler progress

actions.name: RegisterPublisher
actions.description: Grants permission to register account as a publisher of public extensions in the CloudFormation registry

actions.name: RegisterType
actions.description: Grants permission to register a new CloudFormation type

actions.name: RollbackStack
actions.description: Grants permission to rollback the stack to the last stable state

actions.name: SetStackPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to set a stack policy for a specified stack

actions.name: SetTypeConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to set the configuration data for a registered CloudFormation extension, in the given account and region

actions.name: SetTypeDefaultVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to set which version of a CloudFormation type applies to CloudFormation operations

actions.name: SignalResource
actions.description: Grants permission to send a signal to the specified resource with a success or failure status

actions.name: StartResourceScan
actions.description: Grants permission to start a scan of the resources in this account in this Region

actions.name: StopStackSetOperation
actions.description: Grants permission to stop an in-progress operation on a stack set and its associated stack instances

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to tag cloudformation resources

actions.name: TestType
actions.description: Grants permission to test a registered extension to make sure it meets all necessary requirements for being published in the CloudFormation registry

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to untag cloudformation resources

actions.name: UpdateGeneratedTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to update a generated template. This can be used to change the name, add and remove resources, refresh resources, and change the DeletionPolicy and UpdateReplacePolicy settings

actions.name: UpdateStack
actions.description: Grants permission to update a stack as specified in the template

actions.name: UpdateStackInstances
actions.description: Grants permission to update the parameter values for stack instances for the specified accounts, within the specified regions

actions.name: UpdateStackSet
actions.description: Grants permission to update a stackset as specified in the template

actions.name: UpdateTerminationProtection
actions.description: Grants permission to update termination protection for the specified stack

actions.name: ValidateTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to validate a specified template
